hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD4{:}{\blueE{25}}$ because it is located $\blueE{25}$ ticks after $\redD4{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD4{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 4. The long minute hand points to 12. Labels outside the edge of the clock are number 1 through 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/902c443f98f0cc4ff7cfb193235a785fee68f3c6)

And just like on the number line, $4{:}{\blueE{25}}$ is $\blueE{25}$ ticks after $4{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand points just past 4. The long minute hand points to 5. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/83a76d5e7e7d6d0304c5b4f99ea17aee1355e392)

This clock shows $4{:}{25}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points just past 4. The long minute hand points to 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6908e261336149bf3c61f2a877263f941c31f9dc)

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

![The number line goes from 4:00 to 5:00. Every 15 minutes there are labels at 4:15, 4:30, and 4:45. Point A is labeled at 10 marks to the right of 4:15.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/64495854148b274ea8e6affdcb3eeb0dc0db0e55)

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 4. The long minute hand points to 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/46d37d68964723f5cc3aff8bae1f96b4b9675988)
![A clock shows the short hour hand points halfway between 4 and 5. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d3a8df86b297ee8a290cbf57187b97fbbb1d78f4)
![A clock shows the short hour hand points just past 4. The long minute hand points to 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6908e261336149bf3c61f2a877263f941c31f9dc)
